messages.subject: Women's brigade

messages.messageBody:
Have found DETAILED information on Nakano Takeko and the other women at
http://g1342122.at.infoseek.co.jp/index_01.htm-- 3rd page on women warriors.

But for now, I can give you all 3 more names--

Okamura Sakiko
Okamura Makiko
A concubine
